description: This file declares functions related to collecting various device and Zigbee network statistics for a Zigbee device service gatherer module. It includes function prototypes for gathering device information, network counters, network status, firmware events, channel scan stats, camera stats, and device service status, conditioned on a configuration macro.

methods.name: collectAllDeviceStatistics
methods.description: Collects all device-related information including rejoin, check-in info, attribute reports, endpoints, resources, and counters, and populates the runtimeStatsPojo output.

methods.name: collectZigbeeNetworkCounters
methods.description: Gathers Zigbee network counters and updates the runtimeStatsPojo output.

methods.name: collectZigbeeCoreNetworkStatistics
methods.description: Retrieves Zigbee core network status details such as panID, channel, join state, network status, and EUI64.

methods.name: collectAllDeviceFirmwareEvents
methods.description: Collects firmware failure events for Zigbee devices.

methods.name: collectChannelScanStats
methods.description: Gathers Zigbee channel scan statistics and adds them to the runtime stats hash map.

methods.name: collectCameraDeviceStats
methods.description: Collects statistics related to camera devices and updates the runtime stats hash map.

methods.name: collectAllDeviceStatus
methods.description: Retrieves and updates device service status information, implementation specifics to be determined.
